TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed IntersectionDetail extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Provides information about the intersection between the geometries in the and the visual which was hit.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following illustration shows the relationship between the hit test geometry (the blue circle) and the visual geometry (the red square).
![Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing") Intersection between hit test geometry and visual geometry during hit testing
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult.IntersectionDetail%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult>.
[!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet11](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/hittestingoverview/geometryhittest.vb#hittestingoverviewsnippet11)] [!code-cs[HitTestingOverview#HitTestingOverviewSnippet11](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/HitTestingOverview/GeometryHitTest.cs#hittestingoverviewsnippet11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.IntersectionDetail Empty = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The hit test parameter and the target visual, or geometry, do not intersect.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.IntersectionDetail FullyContains = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The hit test parameter is fully contained within the boundary of the target visual or geometry.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.IntersectionDetail FullyInside = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The target visual, or geometry, is fully inside the hit test parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.IntersectionDetail Intersects = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The hit test parameter and the target visual, or geometry, intersect. This means that the two elements overlap, but neither element contains the other.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.IntersectionDetail NotCalculated = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The IntersectionDetail value is not calculated.
